edu.cmu.cs.stage3.image.codec
Class JPEGImageEncoder

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.cs.stage3.image.codec.ImageEncoderImpl
      edu.cmu.cs.stage3.image.codec.JPEGImageEncoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageEncoder
public class JPEGImageEncoder
extends ImageEncoderImpl

An ImageEncoder for the JPEG (JFIF) file format. The common cases of single band grayscale and three or four band RGB images are handled so as to minimize the amount of information required of the programmer. See the comments pertaining to the constructor and the writeToStream() method for more detailed information.
